00057         int numforms;
00058 
00059 public:
00060         __forceinline HWND GetHwnd(int index)
00061                 {return index < numforms ? forms[index]->handle : NULL;}
00062         __forceinline DWORD GetClientWidth(int index)
00063                 {return index < numforms ? forms[index]->clientsize.width : 0;}
00064         __forceinline DWORD GetClientHeight(int index)
00065                 {return index < numforms ? forms[index]->clientsize.height : 0;}

00067                 {return numforms;}
00068         __forceinline void ShowForm(int index)
00069                 {if(index < numforms) forms[index]->Show();}
00070         __forceinline void HideForm(int index)
00071                 {if(index < numforms) forms[index]->Hide();}
